lead_paragraph: The theater-themed fan convention drew nearly 6,000 people for the three-day event at the New York Hilton Midtown, despite a massive snowstorm that shut down Broadway.

byline.original: By ERIK PIEPENBURG and MICHAEL PAULSON

snippet: The theater-themed fan convention drew nearly 6,000 people for the three-day event at the New York Hilton Midtown, despite a massive snowstorm that shut down Broadway.

headline.main: BroadwayCon Carried On, Even as Broadway Went Dark
headline.print_headline: BroadwayCon Goes On, Even as Broadway Doesn’t

abstract: BroadwayCon draws nearly 6,000 musical theater fans to New York Hilton Midtown despite massive snowstorm that paralyzed transportation and caused some celebrities to cancel.
